reviewText:
Three stars because they do show pink, even some fairly lingering spreads and the occasional brief visibility of The Canal.  But the frustrating editing and camera work is all over the place and literally made me groan out loud several times... it's like they're actually trying to spoil your arousal.

When I think of sexy working women, I would probably choose none of the motifs that they did here.  Most of them were professions that require getting sweaty or dirty (and yes, they did smear dirt/mud in two different scenes along with a third that involved so much body paint that no naked skin was visible anymore) or an excuse to use a lot of theatrical smoke to the point where you couldn't see anything.  And there was some weird use of wardrobe here, like the scene where the girl never took off her work gloves even for the spreading and pawing at herself.

This video also suffered from short scenes and a lot of annoying "music video" editing tricks (like cutting good footage down to reduce its explicit nature but then repeating shots they already used, or the maddening lack of continuity where bits of clothing are on then off then on then off then on then off until you want to scream).  And one camera trick really got on my nerves after a while - they constantly tilted the camera sideways at a diagonal or would actually teeter side to side like you're on a little boat on choppy water.  And of course multiple yanking the camera away in each scene, you definitely get very tired of that.  You keep hanging in there though, hoping it gets good but then time's up, fade to next scene.

If you hang in there until after 50 minutes you will see a nice pulled open shot where The Canal is visible.  Of course, they will show her pulling it open once, but cut just before letting you see her do it twice.  And then her panties are suddenly back on again.  I swear, the way everything jumps around so much, its like the editor has ADD and cant stay focused.  They go beyond mere teasing that might increase the anticipation, to the point where they're simply being obstructive and not paying off the shots that set up the tension.

This is the most cheesiest & annoying type of porn there can be.
Theyre just acting dumb in all scenes,very hard to get a boner... thank you.

Penthouse - Working Women is fifty-five minutes long and was released on video on April 18, 2000. The video star the following ladies:

Brook Bradford
Chloe Jones-Penthouse Pet April 1998
Nicole
Samantha Stewart-Penthouse Pet January 1999

Basically, it is four lovely ladies in several working scenes posing sexy. Sometimes they get completely nude and other times they are just there to tease you and look sexy. The four ladies appear in the following order in their work scene:

Brook
Plumbing
Chloe
Car Mechanic
Nicole-Totally Nude
Fire Woman
Chloe & Brook
Painters
Samantha-Totally Nude
Farm Girl
Nicole
Soldier
Chloe
Pool Cleaner
Samantha-Totally Nude
Gardener
Nicole-Totally Nude
Ax Woman

There is no difference between the DVD version and the VHS version. Penthouse - Working Women gets a B+ for the lovely and sexy ladies.

Bought this off Amazon because it was cheap and was pleasantly surprised. The video features Samantha Stewart, Chloe Jones, Nicole, and Brooke Bradfort. This video has several scenes/scenarios, most with solo girl action and a couple girl/girl scenes featuring Chloe and Brooke. All the scenes involve some sort of work/uniform related sexiness (the fire-fighter girl, the pool girl, girls painting, etc...).

Of the 4 girls, 2 are natural (looking) and 2 are surely enhanced. All the babes were really attractive and different types, which kept things fresh, though the dance moves start to look the same about half-way through. Highlights were the blondes, bombshell Chloe and tall, busty girl-next-door type Samantha; both stacked and hot. Chloe really steams up the pool scene with Brook as they pleasure themselves while oogling each other from a distance.

The problem here is that they stretch 4 babes (pun intended) over a whole video, each involved in several scenes. Would have been good to mix in a few more girls to mix it up a bit.

In conclusion - 4 hot babes, different types and they go all out. Nice, lingering pink spreads really take this one up a notch. Could have been better though.

There are some incredibly beautiful women in this video but they are wasted, due to a jumpy camera person who wouldn't dare shoot below the equator.  You'll see more skin in some of the more recent Playboy videos.  Obviously produced by someone else for Penthouse.  Buy the 2001 Pet-Playoff instead.
